snippet: ABC had its best end-of-the-year prime-time numbers since 2000 with coverage of the ball dropping in Times Square, according to preliminary results.
abstract: ABC had its best end-of-the-year prime-time numbers since 2000 with coverage of the ball dropping in Times Square, according to preliminary results.

headline.main: 'New Year's Rockin' Eve' Draws Strong Ratings
headline.print_headline: Best Night Since 2000 for Dick Clark’s New Year’s Countdown Show
